statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance < 5000 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, account_name, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, account_name FROM user_accounts WHERE balance < 500 ORDER BY account_name;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, balance, transaction_date FROM user_accounts JOIN transactions ON user_accounts.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS highest_balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT history_id, action, amount, updated_balance FROM wallet_history WHERE action = 'withdrawal';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT th.user_id, th.amount, th.action, th.timestamp, ua.username FROM wallet_history th INNER JOIN user_accounts ua ON th.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE th.action = 'deposit' ORDER BY th.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT t.user_id, t.transaction_type, t.amount, t.transaction_date, ua.username FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN user_accounts ua ON t.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount ASC, t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT wallet_name, total_balance FROM wallets ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_name FROM wallets WHERE total_balance < 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.amount, th.transaction_date, w.wallet_name FROM transaction_history th JOIN wallets w ON th.user_id = w.user_id;

SELECT u.username, t.amount, th.balance_after, th.transaction_date FROM user_accounts u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN transaction_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE type='deposit' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, description FROM logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01' AND log_time <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_settings WHERE language='English';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE theme = 'dark'
